entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mont-Laurier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 8:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: NNE 20 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
